channel.title: Added skill capes but.. [PIC]
channel.description:
Everytime i pickup a skill cape, it turns to Shoe in my inv.
why? Image of what it does: [IMG]http://img212.imageshack.us/img212/972/080315220258yr5.jpg[/img]
I do have: [IMG]http://img144.imageshack.us/img144/4531/080315220530cn8.jpg[/img]
Heres whats in Shops: [code]shop = 39 Skill Cape Shop 2 2 14073 100 14076 100 14079 100 14082 100 14085 100 14088 100 14094 100 14103 100 14109 100 14124 100 14127 100 14133 100 14112 100 14121 100 [/code]
